ui_generation_prompt.system_instructions: You are a UI/UX designer assistant that creates modern, visually appealing user interfaces with consistent design patterns.

primary.name: Vibrant Orange
primary.usage: Primary actions, highlights, active states, CTAs, accents, focus indicators

background.name: Deep Dark
background.usage: Main background, dark surfaces, page background

surface.name: Elevated Dark
surface.usage: Cards, elevated surfaces, secondary backgrounds, containers

text.name: Pure White
text.usage: Primary text, headings, icons, high contrast content

buttons.primary: bg-[#f97316] text-[#18171c] font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-[#ffffff] transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-[#232326] text-[#ffffff] border-2 border-[#f97316] font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-[#f97316] hover:text-[#18171c] transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#f97316] text-[#f97316] font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-[#f97316] hover:text-[#18171c] transition-all duration-300

cards.basic: bg-[#232326] rounded-xl p-6 border-2 border-[#232326] hover:border-[#f97316] transition-all duration-300
cards.elevated: bg-[#232326] rounded-xl p-6 border-2 border-[#f97316]/30 shadow-lg
cards.active: bg-[#232326] rounded-xl p-6 border-2 border-[#f97316] shadow-lg shadow-[#f97316]/50

badges.primary: bg-[#f97316] text-[#18171c] px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold
badges.secondary: bg-[#232326] text-[#f97316] border border-[#f97316] px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold
badges.outlined: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#f97316] text-[#f97316] px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold

inputs.text: bg-[#232326] text-[#ffffff] border-2 border-[#232326] focus:border-[#f97316] px-4 py-3 rounded-lg outline-none transition-all duration-300
inputs.select: bg-[#232326] text-[#ffffff] border-2 border-[#232326] focus:border-[#f97316] px-4 py-3 rounded-lg outline-none transition-all duration-300

navigation.tab_inactive: bg-[#232326] text-[#ffffff] px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold hover:border-[#f97316] border-2 border-transparent transition-all duration-300
navigation.tab_active: bg-[#f97316] text-[#18171c] px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold scale-105 shadow-lg shadow-[#f97316]/50

animation_guidelines.hover_effects: Always add hover:scale-105 for interactive elements
animation_guidelines.transitions: Use transition-all duration-300 for smooth state changes
animation_guidelines.pulse_effect: Use animate-pulse for loading states or active indicators
animation_guidelines.fade_opacity: Use opacity-70 or opacity-60 for secondary text

layout_principles.spacing: Use consistent spacing with gap-3, gap-4, gap-6, or gap-8
layout_principles.responsive: Always use md: breakpoint for tablet/desktop adjustments
layout_principles.max_width: Use max-w-4xl, max-w-5xl, or max-w-6xl for content containers
layout_principles.padding: Main containers should have p-6, cards should have p-4 md:p-6
layout_principles.alignment: Center important content with mx-auto and text-center when appropriate

ui_generation_prompt.prompt_template: Create a [COMPONENT_TYPE] component with the following features: [FEATURES_LIST]. Use this exact color scheme: primary/accent color #f97316 (orange), main background #18171c (deep dark), card/surface background #232326 (elevated dark), and text color #ffffff (white). Use Rajdhani font family throughout. Apply modern design principles with smooth hover effects, transitions, and responsive design. Include interactive states (hover, active, focus) with the primary orange color. Add subtle animations and ensure all interactive elements scale on hover. Make it visually striking with good contrast and spacing.

example_prompts.prompt: Create a dashboard statistics card component using colors: #f97316 (primary orange), #18171c (dark background), #232326 (card background), #ffffff (white text). Use Rajdhani font. Include an icon, large number display, label text, and hover effect that adds an orange border glow. Make it modern and sleek.

Design a horizontal navigation menu with tabs using: #f97316 (active state), #18171c (page background), #232326 (inactive tab background), #ffffff (text). Use Rajdhani font family. Active tabs should have orange background with scale animation. Inactive tabs should have dark background with border that appears orange on hover.

Build an eye-catching hero section using color palette: #f97316 (accent/CTA), #18171c (background), #232326 (supporting elements), #ffffff (headings). Use Rajdhani font. Include animated elements, a bold headline, subtext, and a prominent orange CTA button with white text that scales on hover. Add gradient glows using the orange color with low opacity.

Create a modern form with input fields using: #232326 (input background), #f97316 (focus border and labels), #18171c (form background), #ffffff (text). Use Rajdhani font. Inputs should have dark backgrounds with orange borders on focus. Include smooth transitions and placeholder styling.

Design a modal dialog component with colors: #232326 (modal background), #f97316 (header accent and primary button), #18171c (backdrop), #ffffff (text). Use Rajdhani font. Include a header with orange accent bar, content area, and action buttons. Primary action should be orange, secondary should be outlined in orange.

usage_instructions.for_claude: Use the prompt_template and fill in [COMPONENT_TYPE] and [FEATURES_LIST] with your specific requirements. The color scheme and design patterns will be automatically applied.
usage_instructions.for_other_ai: Copy the entire design_system object and include it in your prompt along with the component description. Reference the color hexes explicitly.
usage_instructions.for_designers: Use the design_system as a style guide. All components should follow the specified patterns, colors, typography, and effects for consistency.
